name: PasswordInput
description: PasswordInput component for password fields with visibility toggle. Extends MUI TextField with password-specific features including a show/hide toggle button.

props.name: disabled
props.description: If true, the input will be disabled

props.name: required
props.description: If true, the input is required

props.name: error
props.description: If true, the input will indicate an error

props.name: helperText
props.description: Helper text displayed below the input

props.name: showVisibilityToggle
props.description: If true, password visibility toggle is shown

migrationExamples.description: Replace MUI TextField type="password" with PasswordInput for built-in visibility toggle and consistent styling.

accessibility.keyboardNavigation: Tab to input, Tab to visibility toggle button
accessibility.screenReaderNotes: Visibility toggle button announces current state

whenNotToUse: For regular text input (use Input instead)
bestPractices: Use error and helperText for validation feedback
